whyMe.text: I am motivated to continuously expand my skills and keep learning new technologies. It’s fascinating how fast the world is changing, and I want to keep up with this dynamic. Every new skill I learn not only helps me professionally but also allows me to grow personally. I look forward to taking on new challenges again and again and learning from every step. There is so much to discover, and I am determined to apply my expertise where it can make the biggest impact.

learningProgramming.title: I am constantly developing my skills:
learningProgramming.goal: My goal is to continuously improve my abilities and grow with the latest technologies

myProjects.whatILearned: What I learned from the project

join.aboutTheProject: Join helps you manage your tasks using a Scrum board and also maintain your contacts as a proper task management tool.
join.organisation: Through group work with three people, tasks were managed using a Scrum board and regular meetings were held.
join.whatILearned: Through this project, I gained my first hands-on experience with Firebase and learned how to manage a project using the Scrum methodology.

sharky.aboutTheProject: With the help of object-oriented JavaScript, a 2D game was developed. Help Sharky collect poison to defeat the final boss.
sharky.organisation: Independent organization and prioritization of tasks
sharky.whatILearned: First in-depth experience with object-oriented JavaScript programming and working with Canvas.

dsoblog.aboutTheProject: This project includes a custom knowledge base implemented using React and Docusaurus.
dsoblog.organisation: Creation of the project architecture and orchestration of a structured file and folder hierarchy for systematic project development.
dsoblog.whatILearned: Independent learning and hands-on experience with the React and Docusaurus libraries.

header.zwei: What my colleagues say about me

florian.name: Florian Zunke
florian.feedback: During our project work, Elias wrote complex and clean code, which helped move the project forward significantly. His kind and friendly manner made the collaboration very pleasant.

kai.name: Kai Schulz
kai.feedback: I was in close exchange with Elias regarding his Sharky project. Communication was always informative and mutually beneficial. We were able to point out possible code improvements to each other, and I am very satisfied with the collaboration.

contact.text: Contact me: Feel free to reach out to get in touch with me. I am happy to discuss further details. I am open to frontend positions. Contact: contact@elias-herzog.de
